function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variable infectiousness due to gamma distribution assumption","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling of disease propagation and control measures","Mitigation":"Use of more accurate distribution assumptions and continuous validation with real-world data","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, data collection, and analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Epidemiology research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Under-ascertainment of infections (40-50%)","Impact":"Underestimation of the true number of infections and potential spread","Mitigation":"Expanded testing and monitoring, inclusion of asymptomatic cases in data collection","Technologies":"Widespread testing, surveillance systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Public health agencies, testing laboratories","Owner":"Government health departments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Assumption of short-term immunity after recovery","Impact":"Risk of further spread if short-term immunity assumption is inaccurate","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and research on immunity duration and re-infection risks","Technologies":"Epidemiological studies, immune response monitoring, genomic sequencing","People":"Immunologists, virologists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
